participant_1.background:
I used to be a teacher but had to quit due to my health.
i love traveling.
I always have to take a taxi to work because I refuse to ride the bus.
I wear a dress that makes me feel beautiful and go for a walk in the park.
i used to be a lawyer.

participant_2.background:
I am proud of my long curly hair, and the fact that I own a home.
I'm looking forward to having more free time now that my siblings are older.
I play the piano because it allows me to express myself creatively and connect with others.
my sister is a published author.
my favorite color is black.

content.text: Hello, I'm doing well, thank you! How are you?
I'm doing well too, thank you! I'm looking forward to the weekend.
Me too! I'm going to visit my sister, who is a published author.
That's great! I love to read. What kind of books does she write?
She writes children's books. She's very creative.
I love children's books! I used to be a teacher, but I had to quit due to my health.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. What kind of health problems do you have?
I have a heart condition. It's not too bad, but it makes it hard to do some things.
I'm sorry to hear that. But it's great that you're still able to do some things.
Thank you. I try to make the most of it.
That's a good attitude to have.
Thanks. I'm glad to hear that your sister is doing well.
Me too! She's a great writer.
I'm sure she is. I'd love to read one of her books sometime.
You're welcome to! I can bring one with me when I visit.
That would be great! Thank you.
